thread.title: Former Fifth Harmony star Camila Cabello reveals she wants bigger boobs for her birthday
thread.title_full: Former Fifth Harmony star Camila Cabello reveals she wants bigger boobs for her birthday

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Former Fifth Harmony star Camila Cabello reveals she wants bigger boobs for her birthday
text:
Former Fifth Harmony star Camila Cabello reveals she wants bigger boobs for her birthday The pop star revealed the unusual wish for her 20th birthday to fans on Twitter Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She's been focusing hard on a new career as a solo act after leaving Fifth Harmony last year . 
And it seems that Camila Cabello has her heart set on a new look as well as a new career, as she has revealed she'd like "bigger" breasts for her birthday. 
Revealing her wish to increase her cup-size to fans ahead of her big day on Friday, the 19-year-old singer admitted all she wanted was for her boobs "to be a little bigger". Read More Fifth Harmony fans praise band's first performance without Camila Cabello (but have they found a new member in Blake Lively?) Just a "little bigger" please (Photo: Splash News) 
Taking to social media on Monday, the Cuban beauty let her fans in on what exactly she was asking for when she turns 20. 
She told her 3.46million followers that a bigger cupsize was all that she really wanted, tweeting: 
"For my 20th birthday I just want my boobs to be a LITTLE bigger. Just a little [sic]." Camila Cabello has revealed she wants bigger boobs for her 20th birthday (Photo: Rex Features) 
Aside from planning her birthday celebrations, the brunette beauty has been hard at work preparing her solo career after splitting off from Fifth Harmony. 
In December, she shocked fans of the band by announcing her shock departure. 
Despite there being reports of a bad blood between Camila and her ex-band mates. the singer recently insisted she wasn't holding any grudges against them - though she has found the whole process hard. Read More Fifth Harmony to make debut performance as a foursome TONIGHT, following Camila Cabello's shock departure The singer moves on into her Twenties having left Fifth Harmony behind her in her teens (Photo: Nils Jorgensen/REX/Shutterstock) Singers Lauren Jauregui, Normani Hamilton, Dinah-Jane Hansen, Ally Brooke, and Camila Cabello of Fifth Harmony attend the 2016 Billboard Music Awards (Photo: Getty) https://www.instagram.com/p/BRC-LxuA4C3/embed 
Speaking about her feelings towards Lauren Jauregui, Ally Brooke, Dinah Jane Hansen and Normani Hamilton, and her split from the other four popstrels, Camila said: 
"No. I don't want to get into the details of that, because it was really intense and it's hard for me to talk about. It makes me sad. 
"I hoped that it would be a peaceful turning of the page and we would root for each other. But I only got love for them.'' 
But it would seem that Camila is firmly set on moving forwards with her own career, as she recently shared a snap of herself in the studio - indicating she's hard-at-work. Like us on Facebook
